title: UAR: Discussion Panel: Exploring Regional Inter-governmental Organizations, Part 1
description: In this Urban Affairs Review podcast, Jen Nelles and David Miller, alongside a board of regional inter-governmental executive directors, discuss RIGOs in various parts of the United States
